title: ahmad12350
author: ahmad12350
content: Pepina is Launching Today at 8PM GMT+1Pepina is the first hyper-deflationary Pepe token. Missed Pepe? No problem. With our high-end tokenomics and token burnings, we can let the $1 target happen. It will be Launching Today at 8PM GMT+1.​AboutPepina is done watching the meme market frenzy with derivative coins. It's time for the most iconic meme to reign supreme.Pepina is here to elevate memecoins to new heights. $PEPINA is a coin by and for the people, forever. Empowered by a hyperdeflationary mechanism, every sell transaction fuels $PEPINA's journey. Let $PEPINA lead the way to a brighter meme future.- Audit Passed- Kyc-Passed- Safu​HOW TO BUY:Create a WalletDownload metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.ioGet Some ETHHave ETH in your wallet to switch to $PEPINA. If you don’t have any ETH, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.Pepina is the first hyper-deflationary Pepe token. Missed Pepe? No problem! With our high-end tokenomics and token burnings, we can let the $1 target happen.Go to UniswapConnect to Uniswap. Go to app.uniswap.org in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $PEPINA token address into Uniswap, select $PEPINA, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.Switch ETH for $PEPINASwitch ETH for $PEPINA. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.​Website:https://pepina.vip Telegram: https://t.me/PepinaTokenETHTwitter: https://twitter.com/PepinaToken
